title: Sustainable Chem
description: Life Cycle Inventory methodology will be explored as a means to develop new, sustainable products, materials and manufacturing processes
prerequisites: CHBE 3130 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (CHEM 2312 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 2313 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and CHEM 2380 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
